home.subtitle: My name is Jalal Mallah and I’m a Front-End Web Developer. Let’s get to know each other!

projects.title: My Work
projects.description: Here you can see my latest work and projects. This section will be regularly updated as I create and complete new projects.

about.title: About me
about.bio: Welcome to my corner of the internet. I'm glad you're here! A few words about me: I'm an aspiring Front-End Web developer, currently looking for my first job and commercial challenges. A self-taught developer driven by my curiosity to explore and learn new technologies. A huge fan of the React ecosystem and also a huge fan of Uncle Bob's clean code philosophy!
about.private: Privately, a bookworm, polyglot and enthusiast of foreign languages, a lover of strength training, OCR races and a faithful fan of FC Barcelona. If I had to choose one place to live permanently, it would be Marbella.
